svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_11_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/51.0.2704.103 Safari/537.36" version="5.5.4.0" editor="www.draw.io" type="google"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 16px; max-width: 106px; width: 91px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 16px; max-width: 36px; width: 21px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 16px; max-width: 36px; width: 21px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 41px; max-width: 69px; width: 69px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 811px; height: 161px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap;

tr.td: Handles calls for account resolution and name retrieval.

Calls internal services to resolve an End
User's account.

Handles storing the User Number and any associated Account information
(e.g. ILP addresses), and retrieving the Account by User Number.

Called by API; called by User Identification
Service when looking up End User
by Account.
Handles retrieving the End User name by User Number, Account. etc.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 16px; max-width: 106px; width: 75px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 16px; max-width: 106px; width: 83px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 41px; max-width: 69px; width: 69px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 811px; height: 221px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap;

tr.td:
DFSPs will register the name and user number of their customers with the Central Directory where they will be stored for retrieval
in the User identification Service.
Address Resolution Service
One account to one End User
All Accounts are ILP Account AddressesUser Identification Service
Will be expandable to include more user information, but restricted to name
May accept other inputs, but limited to User Number and Account
